attributes.action: Make bonfire night 1 night a year only to protect all our animals from stress
attributes.additional_details: As no one else seems to listen there are loads of people out there who feel the same
attributes.background: It shud be made that fireworks can only be let off on 5th nov due to all our pets being put under so much stress or getting hurt

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556346
